commandlist:
* `+<search> query` - search using keywords (only in Bible Gateway versions)
* `+<setversion> ABBV` - set preferred version to ABBV
* `+<version>` - see what version you've set
* `+<versions>` - see the supported versions
* `+<versioninfo> VER` - read information about a version, using the acronym
* `+<random>` - get a random Bible verse
* `+<verseoftheday>` (`+<votd>`) - get the verse of the day
* `+<setheadings> <enable>/<disable>` - enable or disable topic/chapter headings
* `+<headings>` - see your topic/chapter headings preference
* `+<setmode> mode` - set your preferred mode (use blank command for options)
* `+<mode>` - see your mode preference
* `+<setversenumbers> <enable>/<disable>` - enable or disable verse numbers
* `+<versenumbers>` - see your verse numbers preference
* `+<setlanguage> LANG` - set preferred language to LANG
* `+<language>` - see your current language, if one is set (default: english)
* `+<languages>` - see the supported languages
* `+<users>` - list all users throughout all servers (not counting duplicates or bots)
* `+<servers>` - show how many servers BibleBot is in
* `+<invite>` - get the invite link for BibleBot
* `+<supporters>` - the supporters of BibleBot
commandlist2:
* `+<creeds>` - the ecumenical creeds (contains further commands)
* `+<catechisms>` - catechisms of various denominations (contains further commands)
guildcommandlist:
* `+<setguildversion> ABBV` - set the guild's default version to ABBV
* `+<guildversion>` - see the default version for this guild
* `+<setguildlanguage> LANG` - set the guild's default language to LANG
* `+<guildlanguage>` - see the guild's default language, if one is set (default: english)
* `+<setvotdtime> TIME` - set the VOTD scheduler time to TIME (TIME must be 24h format and in UTC)
* `+<clearvotdtime>` - clear the VOTD scheduler time
* `+<votdtime>` - see the VOTD scheduler time and channel
* `+<setannouncements> <enable>/<disable>` - enable or disable announcements
* `+<announcements>` - see the guild's announcement preference
usage: To use the bot, just say a Bible verse. I'll handle the rest.
creeds_text: These are the creeds available in BibleBot:
catechisms_text: These are the catechisms available in BibleBot:
versionused: You are using <version>. Use `<+><version> <set>` to set a different version.
noversionused: I couldn't find your name in my database, have you used `<+><version> <set>` yet?
versenumbers: Verse numbers are <status>. Use `<+><formatting> <setnumbers>` to change it.
headings: You have headings <status>. Use `<+><formatting> <setheadings>` to change it.
formatting: Your formatting is set to `<value>`. Use `<+><formatting> <set>` to change it.
formattingfail: Use `<+><formatting> <set>` with one of the following parameters: `default, embed, blockquote, code`
languageused: You are using Replace_With_Language_Name. Use `<+><language> <set>` to set a different language.
otnotsupported: The version <version> doesn't support the Old Testament.
ntnotsupported: The version <version> doesn't support the New Testament.
deunotsupported: The version <version> doesn't support the Apocrypha/Deuterocanon.
otnotsupported2: If you want to use the Old Testament, `<+><version> <set>` to a version that has it.
ntnotsupported2: If you want to use the New Testament, `<+><version> <set>` to a version that has it.
deunotsupported2: If you want to use the Apocrypha/Deuterocanon, `<+><version> <set>` to a version that has it.
setguildversionnoperm: You must have the 'Manage Server' permission to modify a guild's version!
setguildversionfail: Failed to set guild version, see `<+><version> <list>`.
guildversionused: This guild is using <version>. Have someone with the 'Manage Server' permission use `<+><version> <setserver>` to set a different version.
noguildversionused: I couldn't find this guild in my database, has someone with the 'Manage Server' permission used `<+><version> <setserver>` yet?
setguildlanguagenoperm: You must have the 'Manage Server' permission to modify a guild's language!
setguildlanguagefail: Failed to set guild language, see `<+><language> <list>`.
guildlanguageused: This guild is using Replace_With_Language_Name. Have someone with the 'Manage Server' permission use `<+><language> <setserver>` to set a different language.
setguildbracketsnoperm: You must have the 'Manage Server' permission to modify a guild's brackets!
setguildbracketsfail: Failed to set guild brackets, the supported bracket options are `<>`, `[]`, `()`, `{}`.
guildbracketsused:
The brackets for this guild are `<brackets>`.

Have someone with the 'Manage Server' permission use `<+><formatting> <setserverbrackets>` to set different brackets.
setvotdtimenoperm: You must have the 'Manage Server' permission to modify a guild's VOTD time!
setvotdtimefail: Failed to set VOTD time, the time must be 24-hour format like `01:00` or `13:00`.
votdtimeused:
The VOTD time for this guild is `<time>` and will be published in `#<channel>`.

Have someone with the 'Manage Server' permission use `<+><votd> <setdailyverse>` to set a different VOTD time or `+<clearvotdtime>` to clear the VOTD time.
novotdtimeused: I couldn't find this guild in my database, has someone with the 'Manage Server' permission used `<+><votd> <setdailyverse>` yet?
clearvotdtimenoperm: You must have the 'Manage Server' permission to clear a guild's VOTD time!
votd: Here is the verse of the day:
passagetoolong: The passage is too long for me to send, sorry.
votdcantprocess: The VOTD can't be processed, see <https://www.biblegateway.com/> for the VOTD.
versioninfo:
**<versionname>**

Contains Old Testament: <hasOT>
Contains New Testament: <hasNT>
Contains Apocrypha/Deuterocanon: <hasDEU>
versioninfofailed: I couldn't find that version, are you sure you used the right acronym?
queryTooShort: Your search query must be longer than 3 characters.
searchNotSupported: +<search> only supports BibleGateway versions at this time.
supporters: A special thank you to the following contributors:
author: by <author>
